title: Christian Twerking Teacher | True Crime Sunday
description:
A Christian teacher at a private school was accused of "twerking" on a student and trying to get him to drink.

Kevin Ware, a former NFL player, is said to have stabbed and strangled his girlfriend before setting her on fire.

A teen from Washington is accused of making up his disappearance and killing his mom's ex-husband because his "biker buddies" threatened him.

A former mayor and bishop who is now 77 years old is accused of sexually abusing children as young as 2.
